Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
associatedNodes_tThis is the structure for each element of the table of the associated nodes
energy_tStructure used to keep track of how much energy is received on each scanned channel
event_object_tObject that defines a single event
event_queue_tStructure that defines the event queue
ftAssocReqDirectDirect association request frame, sent by a new node trying to join the nework, to a coordinator/router that sent a beacon frame
ftAssocReqIndirectIndirect association request frame, forwarded from a router on up to the coordinator
ftAssocRespDirectDirect association response frame, sent from the new parent (coordinator or router) to the new child node
ftAssocRespIndirectIndirect association response frame, sent from the coordinator and (possibly) forwarded by routers to the new node's parent
ftBeaconBeacon frame, sent by coordinator/router in response to a beacon request
ftBeaconReqBeacon request frame, sent from new node into the ether
ftDataData packet, used for data and some MAC functions (see type element)
ftDropChildFrame used to notify a router that one of its children has re-associated with a new parent, and so the router should drop the child from its child table
ftPingFrame used to ping one node from another node
ftRoutingRouting packet, sent by the coordinator and forwarded down a single path of routers
ftWakeWake a child node
macConfig_tStructure to hold config information for the MAC and for this node
panDescriptor_tDefines the PAN descriptor for a received beacon frame
rx_frame_tThis struct defines the rx data container
sftCalCommandCalibration command frame, sent from the coordinator to a end/router node, commanding the node to perform a calibration
sftCalInfoSensor calibration info packet, sent by sensor node to report its data to the coordinator
sftRawDataRaw data (A/D reading) from a sensor node
sftRequestSensor calibration request packet, sent by coordinator to ask sensor node to reply with its cal info
sftRequestDataSensor data request packet, sent by coordinator to ask sensor node to reply with its computed data
sftSensorReadingSensor reading packet, sent by sensor node to report its data to the coordinator
sftSetNameChange name of node packet, sent to sensor node
sixlowpan_addr_contextAn address context for IPHC address compression
sixlowpan_frag_hdrThe header for fragments
sixlowpan_hc1_hc_udp_hdrHC1 followed by HC_UDP
sixlowpan_hc1_hdrThe HC1 header when HC_UDP is not used
sixlowpan_iphc_hdrIPHC dispatch and encoding the rest (uncompressed fields) is variable
superframe_spec_tSuperframe specification frame type
superframe_tThis union allows access to the superframe specification field as a structure or as an integer
tCalFactorsCalibration data, stored in EEPROM
tEepromContentsLocations in EEPROM of the stored data
timerEventTStructure to hold active timers
uip_nd6_naA neighbor advertisement constant part
uip_nd6_opt_hdrND option header
uip_nd6_opt_llaoND option: both TLLAO and SLLAO
uip_nd6_opt_prefix_infoND option prefix information
uip_nd6_rsA router solicitation constant part
